data.name: Adept
data.omni_tool: Biotic Burst (+dex): On a successful melee attack, the target takes force damage equal to 1d6 + your biotic modifier and is pushed backward 4m.
data.weapon: Choose one from Heavy Pistol, SMG
data.skill: Choose three from Acrobatics, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Perception, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, and Survival
data.description: Adepts are biotic specialists, capable of disabling and killing enemies with raw biotic power. While they lack advanced combat training, they are the best at defeating enemies without firing a shot. They are outfitted with L5x implants that can spawn a micro-singularity, damaging enemies and pulling them into the air.

data.name: Engineer
data.omni_tool: Omni-thruster (+dex): On a successful melee attack, the target takes fire damage eqaul to 1d8 + your tech modifier.
data.weapon: Choose one from Heavy Pistol, SMG
data.skill: Choose three skills from Athletics, Engineering, Hacking, History, Investigation, Medicine, Nature, Perception, and Piloting
data.description: Engineers are tech specialists, the only class able to employ combat drones on the battlefield. Engineers are the most effective class at blasting through enemy defenses and disabling opponents.

data.name: Infiltrator
data.omni_tool: Omni-taser (+dex): On a successful melee attack, the target takes lightening damage equal to 1d6 + your tech modifier.
data.weapon: Choose one from Heavy Pistols, SMGs, Sniper Rifles
data.skill: Choose three from Acrobatics, Deception, Engineering, Hacking, History, Investigation, Piloting, Sleight of Hand, and Stealth.
data.description: Infiltrators are tech and combat specialists with the unique ability to cloak themselves from visual and technological detection. Deadly at any range, Infiltrators are equipped with a wide variety of weapons, equipment and powers that can take down any enemy.

data.name: Sentinel
data.omni_tool: Dual omni-blade (+str): On a successful melee attack, the target takes slashing damage equal to 1d8 + your strength modifier.
data.weapon: Choose one from Assault Rifles, Heavy Pistols, SMGs
data.skill: Choose three from Athletics, Engineering, Insight, Intimidation, Medicine, Perception, Performance, Persuasion, Survival
data.description: Sentinels are unique, bringing both tech and biotic abilities to the battlefield. In addition to complete weapons training, Sentinels are equipped with an advanced shield that makes taking cover much less necessary and rushing their enemies much more productive.

data.name: Soldier
data.omni_tool: Omni-blade (+str): +2 to melee attack rolls. On a successful melee attack, target takes puncture damage equal to 1d10 + your strength modifier.
data.weapon: Choose two from Assault Rifles, Heavy Pistols, Shotguns, SMGs, Sniper Rifles
data.skill: Choose three from Acrobatics, Athletics, Intimidation, Medicine, Persuasion, Piloting, Stealth, and Survival
data.description: Soldiers are pure combat specialists. No one is tougher or more effective at taking down enemies with gunfire. High-level operatives are outfitted with ocular synaptic processors that allow them to focus on targets with lethal accuracy.

data.name: Vanguard
data.omni_tool: Biotic Punch (+str):  Dash forward 6m, then make a melee attack. On a success, deal 1d8 force damage and gain 1 Barrier Tick.
data.weapon: Choose one from Heavy Pistols, Shotguns, SMGs
data.skill: Choose three from Acrobatics, Athletics, Deception, Intimidation, Performance, Persuasion, Sleight of Hand, Stealth, Survival
data.description: Vanguards are feared for their high-risk high-reward combat style, closing quickly on enemies and destroying them at close range with weapons and biotic abilities. They are outfitted with L5n implants, enabling them to perform a biotic charge that strikes the opponent with incredible force while closing distance.
